cosmetics.title: Selection of home care cosmetics
cosmetics.subtitle: “I professionally select cosmetics for home care to maintain the results of treatments and preserve the youthfulness of your skin”
cosmetics.information: After a facial rejuvenation procedure, it’s important not to stop at the achieved result — this is the moment when your skin is most receptive to proper care. Home skincare products, carefully selected according to your skin type and post-myolifting needs, help to maintain the effect, support muscle tone, and prolong the youthful appearance of your face.
cosmetics.text: After a consultation, I create a personalized skincare regimen, taking into account your skin condition, lifestyle, and the season. I select only proven brands that are gentle and effective.
